# Paul McCarney's Backward Lentil Soup {#backward-lentil-soup}

#### Keywords {-}

- one medium onion, chopped
- two tablespoons of vegetable oil
- one clove of garlic, crushed
- one cup of carrots, chopped
- two sticks of celery, chopped
- half a cup of lentils
- one bay leaf
- one tablespoon of freshly chopped parsley
- salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
- two and a quarter cups of vegetable stock or water

## Step 1

Boil the water or stock.

## Step 2

Mix the ingredients.

## Step 3

Cook on low boil for 30 minutes.
